fsrtool.name: fsrtool_api_sovereignty
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_api_sovereignty` ( `solarSystemID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `allianceID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `factionID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `solarSystemName` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `corporationID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`solarSystemID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
